story_26_06500/2401_1001_0100_10:
You’re strong... No wonder your team has been
doing so well in the tournament!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_0200_10:
You were awesome, too, Molayne! The Elite Four
sure are strong!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_0300_10: Yeah, makes sense that the machine chose you!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_0500_10:
I think the Sync Pair Pinger never really worked
at all.
story_26_06500/2401_1001_0600_10:
What? But Heliolisk and the other Pokémon reacted
to it, didn’t they?
story_26_06500/2401_1001_0700_10:
I think they just got excited because they saw
[Name:PlayerNickname ] battling and wanted
to join in on the fun!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_0800_10:
You noticed it, too, right? They are your partner
Pokémon, after all!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1000_10:
I suppose you’re right. The machine really was
a failure...
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1100_10: There’s no need to feel bad about it.
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1200_10:
What do you think about me joining your
team, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1400_10:
In my opinion, the machine failed because of a
lack of sync pair data!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1500_10:
With better data, I think the machine could really 
work! If we can get it up and running for real, the
PML will be a breeze!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1700_10:
Big Mo, you’re joining their team to help us
complete the machine?
story_26_06500/2401_1001_1900_10: I’d love to battle you again!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_2000_10:
That battle just now was so exciting! It took me
right back to my island-hopping days with Kukui!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_2100_10: I want to have more battles like that!
story_26_06500/2401_0301_2300_10: We’d love to have you on our team!
story_26_06500/2401_0401_2400_10: Thanks! I’ll give it my all!
story_26_06500/2401_0402_2600_10: Thanks! I’ll give it my all!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_2800_10:
We’ve got another strong ally on our
side! Fantastic!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_2900_10: Molayne, we’ll keep fine-tuning the machine.
story_26_06500/2401_1001_3000_10:
We’ll definitely get it to work right! We made
progress, after all!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_3100_10: Great! Let’s all do our best.
story_26_06500/2401_1001_3300_10: The...the Sync Pair Pinger is picking up something!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_3400_10: And it’s the strongest reading we’ve gotten so far!
story_26_06500/2401_1001_3500_10:
Wait, what? But I thought the machine
wasn’t working!
